entityType.description: The type of the menu component described by this JSON object

name.description: A descriptive identifier for the menu

guid.description: The unique identifier for the menu, assigned by the Toast POS

description.description: A written description of the menu

idString.description: This field is for Toast internal use only

orderableOnline.description: Indicates whether the menu is available for online ordering

orderableOnlineStatus.description: Indicates whether the menu is available for online ordering

visibility.description: Indicates where the menu is displayed and who can see it

startTime.description: The time of day when a time-based menu becomes available

endTime.description: The time of day when a time-based menu stops being available

startTimeHHmm.description: The time of day when a time-based menu becomes available

endTimeHHmm.description: The time of day when a time-based menu stops being available

startTimeLocalStandardTime.description: The time of day when a time-based menu becomes available

endTimeLocalStandardTime.description: The time of day when a time-based menu stops being available

startTimeHHmmLocalStandardTime.description: The time of day when a time-based menu becomes available

endTimeHHmmLocalStandardTime.description: The time of day when a time-based menu stops being available

availableAllTimes.description: Indicates whether the menu is available at all times of the day

availableAllDays.description: Indicates whether the menu is available each day of the week

daysAvailableString.description: A JSON array of strings that lists the days of the week when the menu is available

daysAvailableBits.description: This field is a numeric version of the daysAvailableString field

imageLink.description: A URL to an image located on Amazon S3

date.description: Date folder name from SFTP path
